scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run strictcheck && esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --format=iife --target=es6 --global-name=dotsy --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2015-iife.js & esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --format=esm --target=es2017 --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2017-esm.js & esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --minify --format=iife --target=es6 --global-name=dotsy --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2015-iife.min.js & esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --target=es2017 --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2017-esm.min.js & esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --format=esm --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2020-esm.js & esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --minify --format=esm --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2020-esm.min.js && esbuild src/x.ts --bundle --format=cjs --target=es2017 --outfile=dist/dotsy.es2017.cjs && tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./dist/declarations && node disthelper/declarationbundler.js && rimraf dist/declarations && node disthelper/fileextensionsincreaser.js

name: dotsy
description: Intended for use in educational software that may focus on subitizing, counting or arithmetic.
author: Symbolinker
